abstract: One Police Plaza: Complaints about police behavior, and notification to the city of an impending lawsuit by relatives of a woman who was shot to death.
snippet: One Police Plaza: Complaints about police behavior, and notification to the city of an impending lawsuit by relatives of a woman who was shot to death.
lead_paragraph: To Councilwoman Gale A. Brewer, an "attitude of unwarranted belligerence" has been taking hold among New York City police officers assigned to work with crowds.

headline.main: Complaints of 'Belligerence' and Notice of a Lawsuit
